Class OAImage

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.viaoa.jsp.OAHtmlElement
      • com.viaoa.jsp.OAImage
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    OAJspComponent, java.io.Serializable

    public class OAImage
extends OAHtmlElement
    Controls an html img "src" attribute, to use from a property.

    vvia
